document.full_text: the split in concacaf took another twist on saturday when acting president lisle austin was temporarily suspended for 'possible violations' of its statutes but declared the move against him "illegal."
document.title: concacaf majority suspend acting president
lines_and_colors: the split in concacaf took another twist on saturday when acting president lisle austin was temporarily suspended for 'possible violations' of its statutes but declared the move against him "illegal."
